attributes.action: Speaker of the house challenge PMs facts on every PMQS within 24 hrs
attributes.additional_details:
That whoever the speaker is,they fact check this information,within a reasonable timescale. Or at the close of that business day 
If found to be incorrect a full retraction statement will be made by the PM ,with the correct details.
attributes.background: The Speaker of the house should,if I’m not correct challenge  any MP speaking in the house .However it’s widely know the at PMQS the facts ,figures given out have been incorrect

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
